# ch-grid-rowset-legend

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


> **[DEPRECATED]** Use `ch-tabular-grid` component instead. Use `ch-tabular-grid-rowset-legend` instead.

## Overview

The `ch-grid-rowset-legend` component represents a caption for the `ch-grid-rowset` element.

## Events

| Event                 | Description                               | Type                            |
| --------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| `rowsetLegendClicked` | Event emitted when the legend is clicked. | `CustomEvent<CustomEvent<any>>` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part               | Description |
| ------------------ | ----------- |
| `"caret"`          |             |
| `"icon"`           |             |
| `"selector"`       |             |
| `"selector-label"` |             |
